description: Photos from the path of totality across the United States.
title: Your Photos of A Solar Eclipse’s Journey Across America
title_page: Your Photos of A Solar Eclipse’s Journey Across America - The New York Times
text: In the days and hours leading up to Monday’s total solar eclipse, millions of people ventured to a spot on the path of totality hoping to catch a glimpse of the rare celestial event. Across the country, eclipse-watchers pointed their cameras at the sky. But we wanted to show you what the experience was like on the ground.
